DOC.brief_summary: To comprehensively assess precision agreement anterior corneal power measurement use 8 different device .
DOC.brief_title: A Comprehensive Assessment Anterior Corneal Power Different Devices
DOC.detailed_description: Volunteers healthy cornea measure different instrument detect anterior corneal power . Only right eye subject select . Measurements repeat second session schedule 1 2 week later .
DOC.criteria: healthy cornea , best correct distance visual acuity ( BCVA ) equal good 20/25 , willing able comply schedule visit study procedure . History refractive surgery keratoplasty procedure , use contact lens , history corneal dystrophy degenerative disease , history glaucoma ocular hypertension , significant subjective dry eye symptom , Schirmer I test result less 5.0 mm , tear film breakup time short 5 second corneal fluorescein stain positive .
